index.tagline: Protección Contra la Corrosión de Marina Pilotes

theProblem.title: La Problema
theProblem.body: Unprotected marine pilings erode prematurely, resulting in corrosion of pilings and a weaker structure.

theSolution.title: La Solución
theSolution.body: Tidal Wrap protects pilings, improving the stability and longevity of the structure for years to come.

items.title: Protección por La Zona de Chapeoteo
items.body: Tidal Wrap provides splash zone protection for steel structures, concrete and wood.

items.title: Perfecto por Ambientes Marinos
items.body: Tidal Wrap is ideal for environments where conditions are too severe for paint systems, epoxies and other conventional forms of protection.

items.title: Detiene La Corrosión
items.body: Tidal Wrap seals the oxygen and water and effectively stops corrosion on metal surfaces.

items.title: Previene La Corrosión Adicional
items.body: Tidal Wrap also prevents loosening and corrosion of steel reinforcement in concrete piles. Tidal Wrap encapsulates pier piles, riser tubes and pipes exposed in intertidal zones and splash.

items.title: Varias Configuraciones
items.body: Tidal Wrap accommodates cylindrical piles and H configurations and support members, reinforcement, supports and other uneven surfaces.

smartBand.title: Banda Inteligente de Tidal Wrap
smartBand.body: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip.

items.title: PCS Underwater Primer
items.body: Petrolatum-based primer for use on metal surfaces prior to wrapping with Anti corrosion Petro Tape.

items.title: PCS Marine-Grade Petro Tape
items.body: Synthetic adhesive fabric impregnated and coated with a material based on waxes and oils, covered with anti-bacterial vaseline-based compounds and inert fibers.

items.title: PCS Liner 6000 Series
items.body: The PCS® 6000HD series consists of a proprietary polymer polyolefin, fully protected against UV degradation and oxidation (Guaranteed up to 30 years) with technically advanced stabilization package.

items.title: PCS Smart Band
items.body: A premium high strength composite polymer based Strap and Buckle system, very safe and easy to fit. It has high strength up to 2,551 kgf.

characteristics.title: Tidal Wrap Characteristics & Advantages
body: Since its first introduction in 1929 petrolatum tapes have established an enviable record of performance and unparalleled asset protection in a number of environments.
items: Tested by more than 75-year history of corrosion protection
Resistance to water, salts, alkalis and acids
Can be applied on new or corroded pilings
Mechanical covers are in one piece
High impact shock resistance for damage prevention
Environmentally responsible and safe to use
Maintenance free for a long time

installation.title: Instalación
installation.body: Tidal Wrap is a very versatile and easy system to apply. It is virtually the only solution suitable for splashing zones, inter-tidals as well as underwater installations. The PCS Primer and Tapes will never dry, therefore, will remain soft and will not crack or allow oxygen and or water to the structure.

items.title: A Leading Manufacturer
items.body: PCS is one of the leading manufacturers of anticorrosion tape systems petrolatum, exporting to many countries throughout the world.

items.title: North American
items.body: Located in Toronto, Canada PCS is one of the most efficient in their field and have the latest manufacturing equipment.

items.title: Prevents Corrosion
items.body: PCS products are designed to stop and prevent corrosion in pipes, valves, piles, fittings and flanges in the most extreme environments imaginable.

items.title: Various Applications
items.body: PCS products are used successfully in a variety of applications in oil & gas, pulp & paper, municipal and wastewater industries and routine building maintenance.

contact.title: Contact Key Marine
contact.subTitle: Tidal Wrap is exclusively available from Key Marine Direct Sales Ltd.
